aboutDetails.name: About this Event
aboutDetails.about: Join us at the Renewed Conference, a transformative event designed to empower individuals ready to take bold steps in their career journeys. This conference brings together industry experts, inspirational speakers, and like-minded professionals for a day of learning, networking, and growth. Through insightful talks and interactive sessions, you'll gain the tools, insights, and motivation needed to carve a unique path and make a meaningful impact in your chosen field. Whether you're seeking guidance, clarity, or a renewed sense of purpose, this event will equip you to make a difference in your career path. Don't miss the chance to reimagine your future and unlock new possibilities!

perks.title: Career Coaching Sessions:
perks.description: Receive personalized guidance from experienced career coaches to help you navigate and advance your career path.

perks.title: Exclusive Resource Materials:
perks.description: Take home valuable guides, templates, and toolkits to support your career development long after the conference ends.

perks.title: Professional Headshots:
perks.description: Get a complimentary, high-quality headshot to enhance your online presence and professional profile.
